data.title: AUSTIN POWERS: THE SPY WHO SHAGGED ME (1999)
data.meta_description: A clapperboard signed by Mike Myers from Jay Roachs comedic spy sequel Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me. Used by the A camera unit during filming, the slate is made of acrylic, with a wooden clapper stick affixed to the top. Red outlined boxes feature on the slate, dividing the piece into fields for roll, scene, take, director, camera and date.pThe production title is engraved in red across the top, and the names of the director Jay Roach and director of photography Ueli Steiger  are highlighted in red below. The clapperboard is autographed in black  marker by lead actor Mike Myers in the scene box.pSigns of production use are present on the piece, including scuff marks and tape residue on the back of the clapperstick and minor surface scratches on the acrylic.
